data: Chopimalive | Sitonim | Jim Rye | Daisy Rye | Hugh Grainger

The long and ferocious battle between those desperate wild Indians, Chopimalive and his squaw Sitonim (otherwise known as Jim and Daisy Rye) and the intrepid trader, Hugh Grainger, had come to an end, and the intrepid trader lay dead on the hayfield.
